list_definition.definition: a mischievous, usually dirty or ragged, child, especially a boy

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was chased by a crowd of urchins.

list_ex_of_english: A localized zone of increased conductance progresses over the surface of the sea urchin egg during fertilization.

Microtubules are required for completion of cytokinesis in sea urchin eggs.
Proteolysis of the major yolk glycoproteins is regulated by acidification of the yolk platelets in sea urchin embryos.
